name: CRUSHING BLOW
description: A devastating overhead strike with a mace

name: PRECISION STRIKE
description: A swift and precise double strike with a sword

name: DEADLY THRUST
description: A rapid series of precise and deadly thrusts with a dagger

name: ARCANE BLAST
description: A powerful dual magical blast from a wand

name: SWORD STRIKE
description: A standard strike with a sword

name: SLASH
description: A rapid series of three sword strikes

name: DAGGER SLASH
description: A quick slash with a dagger that causes bleeding

name: MAGIC BOLT
description: A magical bolt that is more likely to hit

name: ARCANE CASCADE
description: A cascading wave of arcane energy that hits multiple times, each strike building in power. Grants +2 INT for 3 turns, making subsequent casts more powerful.

name: MANA MARK
description: Marks the target with unstable mana, weakening them and disrupting their defenses. Applies weaken and -3 to enemy's next roll. Grants +3 roll bonus to your next action.

name: DESPERATE MAGIC
description: A dangerous spell that channels life force into raw power. Deals double damage when health is below 25%. Takes 5% self-damage but grants +1 INT for 2 turns.

name: ARCANE ECHO
description: Fires a magical bolt that echoes back, add 1 attack to next action. The echo grows stronger in combos, making it perfect for chaining spells.

name: ENVIRONMENTAL HAZARD
description: The environment unleashes a dangerous effect

name: ENVIRONMENTAL BLESSING
description: The environment provides a beneficial effect

name: JAB
description: A quick jab attack

name: TAUNT
description: Taunts the enemy, drawing their attention

name: WEB STRIKE
description: Strikes with webbing that slows the target

name: POISON BITE
description: A venomous bite that poisons the target

name: BITE
description: A fierce bite attack

name: HOWL
description: A howl that intimidates enemies

name: FIRE BOLT
description: A bolt of fire that burns the target

name: IGNITE
description: Ignites the area, causing burn damage over time

name: MAGMA FIST
description: A massive fist of molten rock and metal

name: ERUPTION
description: Causes a volcanic eruption that hits multiple times

name: BAT SWARM
description: A swarm of bats attacks multiple times

name: QUICK STRIKE
description: A quick strike that's hard to dodge

name: BONE STRIKE
description: Strikes with bony appendages

name: RATTLE
description: Rattles bones to intimidate enemies

name: CLAW
description: Slashes with undead claws

name: GROAN
description: A terrifying groan that weakens enemies

name: SOUL DRAIN
description: Drains the soul, dealing damage and weakening the target

name: PHASE
description: Phases through reality, becoming harder to hit

name: VENOMOUS BLOODFURY
description: A devastating triple strike that inflicts both bleeding and poison wounds. The wielder's weapon drips with venom as they strike three times in rapid succession, each hit more precise than the last. The combination of toxins and open wounds makes this attack particularly deadly, and the wielder draws strength from the damage dealt.
